name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II
description: Installer for the retail version of the game (DVD, or image).
notes: You might need a patch to be able to run the game without the media.
content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Please select setup.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/SEGA/Dawn of War 2/DOW2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Game...
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
